  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static boolean initialize(Connection con) throws SQLException, FileNotFoundException
      Initialize the database with the SQL scripts in initialiser.sql
      Parameters:
      con - Connection to the database
      Returns:
      Returns true if connection is open and the SQL is proceeded successfully
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is any SQL error happening
      FileNotFoundException - If the file is missing

    • getTopic

      public static String getTopic(Connection con, int topicId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

      topicId - Id of the topic
      Returns:
      The topic's name
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is any SQL errors happening

    • printDocument

      public static void printDocument(Connection con, int docId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

      docId - Id of the document
